record.description: University of Chicago Campus Revue Opens Tonight. The chorus of the University of Chicago Mirror-Blackfriars musical comedy, "Include Me Out," goes through a number at final dress rehearsal for the show, which opens tonight on campus in Mandel Hall. Left to right: Marian McCollum, Nancy Rice, Virginia Elenebom, Diana Butts, Ruth Altschuler, Peggy Williams, and Jeanne Nilsen.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
